attributes.action: stop supermarkets from  providing customers with bags
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's going this way, why not speed things up? We need to change our habits so that we don't expect a bag, it's up to us to take something with us to put our shopping in.  It's an inconvenience but we'd all get used to it pretty quickly, if it was across the board.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
